content:
Winchester College has a diverse range of sports and extracurricular activities on offer, providing options for a wide variety of student interests. These include:

Sports:
- Cricket 
- Football (Soccer)
- Rugby Union
- Hockey 
- Fives
- Athletics 
- Rowing
- Tennis 
- Squash
- Badminton 
- Cross Country

Extracurricular Activities:
- Music (choirs, orchestras, ensembles, bands)
- Drama (productions, plays, theater competitions)
- Debating (public speaking, Model United Nations)
- Community Service (volunteering, fundraising, awareness campaigns)
- Publications (student newspapers, magazines, yearbooks)
- Chess
- Art (drawing, painting, sculpture)
- STEM (robotics, coding, mathematics, science clubs)

These activities provide students with opportunities to develop their talent, leadership skills, and social behavior. They can also help students build their confidence, sense of teamwork, and abilities to communicate effectively. Winchester College believes extracurricular activities play a central role in the overall development and education of students.
